body: Hugo Alburquerque, from the blog O Descurvo, celebrates [pt] the 31st birthday of the Brazilian Partido dos Trabalhadores [Workers Party or PT] by saying that "today is the birthday of the worst Brazilian party, with  the  exception of all thers others and  which  is, incidentally, the great  adversary of itself".
original_body: Hugo Alburquerque, from the blog O Descurvo, celebrates [pt] the 31st birthday of the Brazilian Partido dos Trabalhadores [Workers Party or PT] by saying that "today is the birthday of the worst Brazilian party, with the exception of all thers others and which is, incidentally, the great adversary of itself".
title: Brazil: 31st birthday of the Workers Party

sentence: Hugo Alburquerque, from the blog O Descurvo, celebrates [pt] the 31st birthday of the Brazilian Partido dos Trabalhadores [Workers Party or PT] by saying that "today is the birthday of the worst Brazilian party, with  the  exception of all thers others and  which  is, incidentally, the great  adversary of itself".
